name: @perspect3vism/neighbourhood-language
description: This is a Language for storing AD4M neighbourhood objects

scripts.integration-test: node ../../test-runner/build/cli.js --test ./integration.test.cjs --bundle ./build/bundle.js --meta '{"name":"file-storage","description":"An AD4M Language for file storage leveraging a holochain DNA","sourceCodeLink":"https://github.com/perspect3vism/file-storage-language","possibleTemplateParams":["uid","name"]}'
scripts.build:windows: cd hc-dna && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./build.ps1 && cd .. && tsc && rollup -c

author: joshuadparkin@gmail.com
